en-US.summary: The classic hangman game, designed for Echo Show and other Alexa devices. Fun and Educational. Words are categorized. Contains a dictionary.
en-US.name: Hangman Game - with display for Echo Show
en-US.description: The classic hangman game with display. You may pick a category upon start or simply say "Start" to pick a random category. Guess the word by saying letters (e.g. "A"). If your Alexa device doesn't have a screen, you may still check your hangman progress by saying "Progress". When the game ends, you may check the definition of the word by saying "Dictionary".
